remarks.para:
This is the main entry point for the Tingen web service, and contains the two methods required by Avatar:
This class does very little work itself, as the heavy lifting is done in Outpost31.
This source code should be pretty static, and should not be modfied.
Please see the Tingen documentation for more information.

member.name: P:Tingen_development.Tingen_development.AssemblyName
member.remarks: The assembly name is defined here so it can be used to write log files throughout the class.

members.member: Tingen current version. The version number is referenced in both GetVersion() and RunScript().

member.name: M:Tingen_development.Tingen_development.GetVersion
member.summary: Get the current version of Tingen.
member.remarks: This method is required by Avatar and should not be modified.

member.name: M:Tingen_development.Tingen_development.RunScript(ScriptLinkStandard.Objects.OptionObject2015,System.String)
member.remarks: This method is required by Avatar and should not be modified.
